item.name: Bladewing the Risen
item.text: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.name: Bogardan Hellkite
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
item.flavorText: Cleansing the world, one breath at a time.

item.name: Draco
item.text: Domain — Draco costs {2} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Flying Domain — At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Draco unless you pay {1}0. This cost is reduced by {2} for each basic land type among lands you control.

item.name: Dragon Whelp
item.text: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: Dragon whelps face few threats besides their own enthusiasm.

item.name: Dragonstorm
item.text: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
item.flavorText: Dragons come not in packs or in herds but in storms.

item.name: Ebon Dragon
item.text: Flying When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.
item.flavorText: "The dragon wing of night o'erspreads the earth." —Troilus and Cressida, William Shakespeare

item.name: Form of the Dragon
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of each end step, your life total becomes 5. Creatures without flying can't attack you.

item.name: Hellkite Overlord
item.text: Flying, trample, haste {R}: Hellkite Overlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {B}{G}: Regenerate Hellkite Overlord.
item.flavorText: "The dragon has no pretense of compassion, no false mask of civilization—just hunger, heat, and need." —Sarkhan Vol

item.name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
item.text: Flying When Kokusho, the Evening Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
item.flavorText: The fall of the evening star never heralds a gentle dawn.

item.name: Nicol Bolas
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

item.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
item.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: As brilliant as a cut diamond, and with just as cruel an edge.

item.name: Rith, the Awakener
item.text: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

item.name: Shivan Dragon
item.text: Flying {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

item.name: Thunder Dragon
item.text: Flying When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

item.name: Two-Headed Dragon
item.text: Flying {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Two-Headed Dragon can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature.
